definition: variant of 鏈|链[lian4], chain/variant of 煉|炼[lian4]

sentences.english: Production costs and pollution can be reduced in iron-smelting by means of SAD in small blast furnace.
sentences.chinese: 小高炉使用硫酸渣炼铁能降低生产成本，减少污染。

sentences.english: Our work grows out of a small blast furnace plant which is set up in1913.
sentences.chinese: 我们厂的前身是一家小炼铁厂，建于1913年。

sentences.english: Why put a gallery in an ironworks ?
sentences.chinese: 为什么要将画廊办在炼铁厂里？

sentences.english: The gas mud after making divide zinc can continue puddling raw material is used.
sentences.chinese: 使除锌后的瓦斯泥可继续作炼铁原料使用。

sentences.english: " Cooking the books and paper" than" bungled ironmaking" better.
sentences.chinese: 而且“煮书造纸”比“砸锅炼铁”还要高明。

sentences.english: This paper describes how the remote control gunning technology was used in AISC Ironmaking Plant.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了鞍钢炼铁厂应用炉衬遥控喷补技术的情况。

sentences.english: A new blast furnace pro-cess of full oxygen blast is also analyzed by this model.
sentences.chinese: 用此模型解析了高炉氧气炼铁新工艺的操作状态。

sentences.english: The paper briefly discusses the transformation of the high stove in No . 2 Iron Factory of XuanHua Irom and Steel Company.
sentences.chinese: 简述宣钢第二炼铁厂某高炉的改造情况及措施。

sentences.english: In the production process of puddling, sinter is multiphase.
sentences.chinese: 烧结矿做为炼铁的中间产物，是一种多相介质。

sentences.english: Without coke iron cannot be smelted.
The main position that Shandong iron-making is confronted with is saving resources and protecting environment.
sentences.chinese: 山东炼铁面临的主要形势是资源节约和环境保护“。

sentences.english: It is one year since New Iron-making Plant implemented precision time-check for equipment.
sentences.chinese: 总结炼铁新厂一年来精密点检工作的开展情况。

sentences.english: Coke is and remains an indispensable raw material for iron-making in the foreseeable future.
sentences.chinese: 在可预见的未来，焦炭仍是炼铁不可缺少的原料。

sentences.english: For example, the ancient Egyptians, more than 3,000 years ago, had learned skill in working iron.
sentences.chinese: 比如三千多年前的古埃及人已经学会了炼铁术。

sentences.english: The present state of solid fuel consumption in the sintering system of Masteel No. 1 Iron Works is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了马钢第一炼铁厂烧结系统固体燃耗的现状。

sentences.english: Can ironworker control the quality of the iron they make then?
sentences.chinese: 那时炼铁工人能够控制他们所炼的铁的质量吗？

definition: a blast furnace (in modern times)/a draft assisted furnace for smelting metals
coking/the process of producing coke from coal
